Name: QuestionSchemeName
Description: A name for the QuestionScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the QuestionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the QuestionScheme. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: QuestionSchemeReference
Description: Allows for the inclusion of another QuestionScheme by reference.

Name: QuestionGroupReference
Description: Contains a group of Questions, which may be ordered or hierarchical.
